title: SuperFOIL Foil Tape - Thermal Reflective Peel and Stick Foil Tape for Sealing Seams and Edges 100mm x 20m
features: ON A ROLL - Wide Width Roll Secures Insulation, Joins Overlaps and Seals Edges in One Easy Application, Super Strong High-Tack Adhesive for Long-Lasting Hold.

REFLECTIVE PROPERTIES - High Emissivity Surface forms a Radiant Barrier that Prevents the Transfer of Infra-Red Heat Energy Helping to Provide Maximum Thermal Performance and Eliminate Cold Spots and Draughts.

ESSENTIAL COMPONENT - Ideal for Fixing, Joining and Sealing Insulation Sheets, Boards and Rolls. Used with Multifoils, Bubble Insulation and Foil Membranes to Complete the Air-Tight and Waterproof Barrier Preventing Condensation
SAVE MONEY - SuperFOIL Foil Tape Maximizes the Thermal Efficiency of Insulation, Retaining Heat in the Home and Saving Energy. Reduces Monthly Bills and Your Carbon Footprint.

TRUSTED BRAND- SuperFOIL Reflective Insulation Products are Independently Tested to Comply with Relevant UK Building Regulations for use in Construction and meet European Regulations such as CE. These Assessments are Carried out by Notified Bodies and 3rd party Certified Laboratories.
description: Product Description SuperFOIL Insulation Reflective Foil Tape Upgrade your insulation with SuperFOIL Foil Tape! Ideal for joining and sealing, it optimises thermal performance and withstands varying temperatures. Simple, effective, and designed to create a well-insulated, energy-efficient space. SuperFOIL Foil Tape – your solution to a warmer, cosier home. Maximise Efficiency with Foil Tape Weather Resistant Foil Tape Our foil tape is specifically designed to withstand outdoor conditions, providing reliable and long-lasting sealing and insulation Versatile and DIY Friendly Foil Tape From insulation and ductwork sealing to patching and repairing, our versatile foil tape adapts effortlessly to a wide range of applications, making it an indispensable tool for contractors, DIY enthusiasts, and professionals alike. Harness the power of foil tape Installs quickly and easily Experience hassle-free installation and user-friendly convenience with our foil tape, featuring an easy-to-use design that allows for seamless application, ensuring quick and efficient use in various projects without any complicated processes or specialised tools required. Wide Roll for easy application Our foil tape comes in a generously wide roll , providing you with ample coverage and allowing for efficient application, saving you time and effort by reducing the number of tape strips required to complete a task, making it ideal for large-scale projects or situations that demand broad coverage The video showcases the product in use. Choose SuperFOIL and change the way you insulate. What is foil tape? Foil tape, is a type of tape that is coated with a thin layer of foil. It is often used in sealing and insulation work, due to its heat-reflective and light-reflective properties What are the uses of foil tape? Foil tape is widely used in a variety of applications including HVAC ductwork sealant, temporary repair of metal surfaces, copper pipe fixing, and shielding applications in electronics. It's also used for thermal insulation & heat reflection What advantages does foil tape have over other types of tape? Foil tape has advantages over other types of tape. It is more resistant to heat, humidity, water, UV degradation, and certain chemicals. It can also withstand extreme temperatures, both high and low, making it useful in a wide range of environments Can foil tape be painted? While it's possible to paint over foil tape, it may not adhere as well as it would to other surfaces. If you do choose to paint over foil tape, it's generally best to apply a primer first to help the paint adhere better Is foil tape suitable for outdoor use? Foil tape is resistant to UV radiation, weathering, and water, which makes it suitable for outdoor use More Must-have Products from SuperFOIL Insulation SuperFOIL Foil Tape Add To Basket SuperFOIL Radpack Add To Basket SuperFOIL SF19+ Add To Basket SuperFOIL SFTV FR Add To Basket SuperFOIL SFUF Add To Basket Customer Reviews 3.8 out of 5 stars 291 4.4 out of 5 stars 7,716 4.3 out of 5 stars 17 5.0 out of 5 stars 2 4.3 out of 5 stars 4 Price £7.99 £ 7 . 99 £19.99 £ 19 . 99 £109.99 £ 109 . 99 £57.99 £ 57 . 99 £129.99 £ 129 . 99 Width 100mm 0.6m 1.2m 1m 1.5m Length 20m 5m 10m 25m 8m Thickness <1mm 3mm 45mm <1mm 6mm # of Layers 1 3 11 1 13 Core Performance (R Value) — 0.12 1.63 — 0.8 Roof Performance (R Value) — 1.03 2.27 0.4898 — Wall Performance (R Value) — 1.45 2.73 0.7398 — Floor Performance (R Value) — 2.77 4.37 0.1622 —
